4304250.name: Fun Zone Omega Demo
4304250.description:
Explore, survive, and vibe in this post-apocalyptic RPG set in a vacation resort gone wrong. Choose your squad from 12 eccentric misfits, and scavenge the ruins of a hypercapitalist dystopia. Can you escape a hostile planet that loathes your very existence?

This demo contains 2-3 hours of gameplay equal to 20% of the full game.

  • Assemble your crew from 12 bizarre adventurers—each with unique field skills, combat abilities, and delightfully quirky personalities. There's a clown, a ninja, a neanderthal, a skeleton, a sentient Twinkie, and it only gets weirder from there.

  • Freely roam the sprawling ruins of Vacation Island, a post-apocalyptic paradise with over 400 screens to explore. Gain experience not just from battles, but from discovering forgotten places.

  • Arm yourself with the absurd leftovers of a decadent civilization: pool noodles, nail guns, rollerblades, x-ray glasses, and more. Each of the 200 items comes with its own stats and abilities.

  • Face off against a mutant menagerie: gun-toting mermaids, flesh-hungry flamingos, mushroom fairies, homicidal jello cakes—and much, much worse.

  • Survival is more than combat. Disarm traps, hack ATMs, forage for food, dig tunnels, and use your party’s field skills to outwit the island’s many dangers.

  • Discover lore by interacting with hundreds of strange landmarks. Every description and line of dialogue changes depending on who’s in your party.

  • 10-12 hours of exploring, battling, and resource management. No filler!

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
